description:
"Typography is an art. Good typography is art."

Paul Rand


The Forge is a curated collection of premium font foundries to up your type game in Figma. Hundreds of high-quality typefaces are just a few click ahead.


How

Each card contain a link to the foundry website, where you can download trials fonts to test before purchasing the licence.
